Texts.Eng: Chacharra happy, have all Akki need. Here you go: weapon for you. Use it much, fights you win.

Chacharra need materials. Many materials. Many pixels, too, want payment. ^green;Find Chacharra ^orange;12 Hardened Scrap Metal ^green;and ^orange;30000 Pixels^green;. ^white;Then Chacharra will make weapon for you.
